seoDescription: Help us improve HearWell by sharing your experience. All feedback is anonymous and helps make hearing health tools better for everyone.
title: Share Your Experience
subtitle: Your feedback helps improve HearWell for everyone. Completely anonymous, no personal data collected.
formDescription: Share how HearWell has helped you, or let us know how we can improve. Every voice matters.
privacyNotice: ðŸ”’ This form collects NO personal information. Your feedback is completely anonymous. We do not store IP addresses, cookies, or any identifying data.
messagePlaceholder: Example: "HearWell helped me identify my tinnitus frequency and start sound therapy. The free audiometer gave me insights before my doctor visit..."
successMessage: Thank you! Your feedback has been received and will help improve HearWell.
submitError: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact us directly.
benefit1: Helps us prioritize features that matter most to users
benefit2: Identifies bugs and usability issues we might have missed
benefit3: Inspires others with tinnitus to try HearWell
benefit4: Completely anonymous - we never ask for personal info
